headerDownload: How to run your VPN with Amnezia

protocolsCard.header: Supports modern protocols to bypass blocking

mainText.part1: To work even in places where other VPNs don't work - China, Iran, and Turkmenistan.
mainText.part2: For countries with low internet censorship, Amnezia supports WireGuard and OpenVPN.

protocolsCard.link: List of supported protocols by platform

feature1.header: Share your VPN connection to a VPN with anyone
feature1.text: In a few clicks and no restrictions

feature2.header: Choose which sites will be opened via VPN and which will not
feature2.text: Split tunneling is available on Windows, Linux and Android

feature3.header: Import connection settings for WireGuard and OpenVPN

text.part1: In 2022, Amnezia VPN successfully passed the security audit conducted by 7ASecurity.
text.part2: in free access not only the source codes of the client part, but also the source codes of the server part.

simple.text: Enter the IP-address, username and password of your server, and the program will automatically configure everything to connect via VPN

free.text: With Amnezia VPN you don't connect to our servers and don't pay us anything. To connect you use your own or buy any VPS from any provider. The application is also free.
